tests.sic.sST.nbin

Class sSTCnbinFixedTOpt

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.sST.nbin.sSTCnbinFixedTOpt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizerIntf

    public class sSTCnbinFixedTOpt
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizerIntf
    class implements an optimizer over the first two variables of the (s,S,T) policy, namely the reorder point s and the order-up-to S variables, for given (fixed) review period T. The system being optimized faces stochastic demands as described in the class sSTCnbin. The solution found is guaranteed to be the global optimum for the given review period T.

    Notes:

    • 2021-06-07: excluded fixed review costs from lower bound as they decrease in time.
    • 2021-06-06: fixed issue related to computing the G(.) function given demand rates and process parameters.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2021

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0

      • minimize

        public PairObjTwoDouble minimize(FunctionIntf func)
                          throws OptimizerException
        obtains the global minimum over all s and all S ≥ s of the function sSTCnbin(s,S,T) for the given T. Implements the Zheng- Federgruen algorithm for (s,S) policy optimization with appropriate modifications in the formulae for computing the function G(y) to account for the review length T.
        Specified by:
        minimize in interface OptimizerIntf
        Parameters:
        func - sSTCnbin instance
        Returns:
        PairObjTwoDouble // Pair<double[] x, double cb, double lb> // where x[0] is s_opt, and x[1] is S_opt for _T.
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
